casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ryan Gabriel GARCELL. No. 465A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 20, 2007. Thomas Maher, Ann Marie Gomez, for Garcell. Charlie C. Walker, Asheville, William Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of December 2007 by State of NC for Extension of Time to file response to Defendant's Motion for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of December 2007."
